Spatio Temporal Statistics BoHyun Shin 2020-07-14 Preface This is a gitbook for documentation of spatio temporal statistics. It is aimed at enhancing theoritical and practical aspect. The software used in this book is R, which is widely used for statistical modeling. Followings are references to make this book. Spatio-Temporal Statistics with R, Cressie Hierarchical Modeling and Analysis for Spatial Data Handbook of spatial statistics-CRC If you have any questions about the contents, please raise issue here.
